title: What technology or invention could have the biggest implications on the future of humanity? - Quora

response.answer_text: All of the discoveries and inventions of human were made by the human "Brain". The Brain is the tool that we used for thousands of years to do more than survival. To explore. create. invent. And the funny thing is that Brain wasn't even designed to do all the scientific discoveries. It was a tool for survival that we decided to use for something much more than just living. I'd say the most Brilliant invention that we should have in the future is Brains that are actually designed to discover and innovate. A higher level of Intelligence and Consciousness.

Probably a sustainable, renewable energy source that works well across climates, including space. That would give us fuel to power whatever we needed without depleting resources and yield a way to power a space craft for interstellar travel. Once we have a portable, sustainable power source and can travel to other planets, we’re a lot less vulnerable as a species and don’t need Earth as our main planet.
